inputs.description: show the version number  ------------------------------------------ process options:
inputs.name: VER

inputs.description: specify a list of labels to search for  e.g. -labels Left-Cerebral-White-Matter  Left-Cerebellum-White-Matter  \ Right-Cerebral-White-Matter Right-Cerebellum-White-Matter \ CC_Posterior CC_Mid_Posterior CC_Central CC_Mid_Anterior  \ CC_Anterior Brain-Stem  e.g. -labels FS_white_matter  For convenience, there are 2 label groups:  FS_white_matter (as in the example):  Left-Cerebral-White-Matter  Left-Cerebellum-White-Matter Right-Cerebral-White-Matter Right-Cerebellum-White-Matter CC_Posterior CC_Mid_Posterior CC_Central CC_Mid_Anterior CC_Anterior Brain-Stem  FS_ventricles  Left-Lateral-Ventricle Left-Inf-Lat-Vent 3rd-Ventricle 4th-Ventricle CSF Right-Lateral-Ventricle Right-Inf-Lat-Vent 5th-Ventricle
inputs.name: LABELS
